<Extension()> Public Function AddMicrosoftWebApiCallsWebApi (builder As MicrosoftIdentityWebApiAuthenticationBuilderWithConfiguration, configuration As IConfiguration, Optional configSectionName As String = "AzureAd", Optional jwtBearerScheme As String = "Bearer") As MicrosoftIdentityAppCallsWebApiAuthenticationBuilder

Docs.param: The to which to add this configuration.

Docs.summary: Protects the web API with Microsoft identity platform (formerly Azure AD v2.0). This method expects the configuration file will have a section, named "AzureAd" as default, with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.
